mapper.update: UPDATE user_info aa SET aa.direct_leader_id = ( SELECT c.id FROM ( SELECT b.* FROM user_info b WHERE DATE_FORMAT(b.created_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y-%m-%d') or DATE_FORMAT(b.updated_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y-%m-%d') ) c WHERE c.if_id = aa.if_direct_leader_id)
